duties_responsibilities.duty: Administer sales compensation calculations and analysis using vendor-based software, Excel, Access, and internal databases.
Execute and coordinate data consolidation, integrity/audit, and data extraction/reporting.
Utilize MS Access and MS Excel to run queries, extract data, and troubleshoot queries.
Implement compensation plan requirements into the system, and provide ongoing support to sales leadership and representatives.
Provide end-user customer service via phone and email, and ensure effective and efficient communication.
Maintain precise documentation and record retention in line with company policy.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree (preferred) in Business Administration, Business Management, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field
